import { useContext } from 'react'; import { JobContext } from "../context/JobContext"; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import Nav from 'react-bootstrap/Nav'; function JobCard({ job }) { const { deleteJob } = useContext(JobContext); return(

{job.title}

{job.description}

Job Post Link Disabled
Special title treatment With supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content.
); } export default JobCard;
